channel.title: Blog of the Dad
channel.description: Recent content on Blog of the Dad

item.title: Why tho
item.description: What and why? Dawn of the Dad is basically the 2 solvers: one for sudoku, and another for building crosswords. The first is largely complete, so most of my time now is dedicated to beefing up the crossword builder. So why build the site and why ramble in this blog? The site is my excuse to write some code, both to stay sharp and because I like doing it, solve some algorithmically interesting problems, and revisit some of the neat things I’ve learned about back in grad school.
